duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through B2B sales and prospecting.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touchpoints to drive outcomes.
Engage in face-to-face networking and critical business discussions to solve business owners' problems.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth.
Participate in client acquisition activities using a custom CRM platform.
Reinforce client relationships and drive renewals through compelling communication.
Participate in training to enhance sales skills and performance.
